## AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of AuthInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AUTH_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: FactoryProvider
```
